data.name: My Furry Neighbour üêæ
data.detailed_description:
Wishlist our new game:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1928840/My_Dragon_Party/


About the Game

Wishlist our new game My Furry Dragon:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1818370/My_Furry_Dragon/

Life can be boring sometimes - work, daily routine... Who can change it? A new neighbor, of course! Especially a sexy goth one!
Experience a romantic story of an ordinar otaku and his new cute neighbour, who likes to bully him... "Sometimes"...

My Furry Neighbour is a short visual novel about the relationship with a new neighbour that grows into something more than just friendship.

The game's main character lives a boring otaku life in a small town where nothing interesting happens. But one day something completely unusual happens to him: he meets his new neighbor, who turns out to be not so bad. They spend time together and our character begins to experience new feelings, previously unknown to him. But will he be able to overcome his complexes and achieve happiness?

‚Ä¢ New sexy neighbour!
‚Ä¢ Fascinating story with romance and comedy elements.
‚Ä¢ HD fully original artworks.
‚Ä¢ Multiple choice.
‚Ä¢ 2 hours of content.
‚Ä¢ Relaxing atmosphere.
‚Ä¢ Great music.

data.short_description: There's a new girl in town! You live a boring otaku life until one day your new neighbour completely changes everything. Experience a story full of romance, comedy and a little personal drama!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: anything from this millenium
  • Graphics: 2 GB RAM
  • Sound Card: potato

content_descriptors.notes: This visual novel contains partial nudity, mentions of alcohol consumption, sexual themes and dialogue.
